title: Leavebuster Cant do anything in queue
body:
Hi everyone i have just recently got a leavebuster queue for 20mins and its really annoying however i think that they could do something to still not make everyone so angry first of all when in the leavebuster queue YOU CANT DO ANYTHING ON LEAGUE i think that they should make it so that you are able to check masteries and runes ect just like in a normal queue as it is extremely annoying and this is the least they could do to help with the frustration. 

The other thing is i have countlessly been watching a video and missed the accept button when the queue time has finished meaning i have to go through the 20mins again just to get into the same queue this is stupid as after 10-30mins of waiting for your queue to end you sometimes forget it is even going. they should fix this so that once you have gone through the queue it counts down off your list or if you dont accept a message comes up saying stay in queue or leave (if you have a timer that is) this is the most frustrating thing about the leavebuster itself.

Finally i personally think that there should be easier ways to reduce the amount of time you get in the next queue i have heard a friend say it takes something like 10-20 full games before your timer goes from 20mins to 10mins and similar for 10mins to 5mins this is outrageous considering we sometimes have days where our internet is not working so you dc a lot or your game just crashes and doesn't want to work anymore.

Overall i don't think that Leavebuster is an horrible thing i love it a lot in that it stops trollers but to be honest they really need to fix some things up with it!

Sincerely,

XXJMANXX {{champion:33}} {{item:3143}}

replies.body: You're complaining about a punishment. I honestly don't know what you expected a punishment to be but pleasant isn't it.
^ It's like a kid asking to eat candy during a time out.

How does it stop the trollers...
Im going to love this because it doesn't,it catches players that are being trolled and they get punished while the known troller gets to que up straight away.....
so how is this punishment for the trollers then?
Its a very sad system that relies on scripts and that in its self is pure laziness...
Its the very same with feeding,verbal abuse the whole thing....
They have access to server logs but are just to lazy to use them.....

Just because they are breaking the rules doesn't mean you should, they will get punished for trolling (when Rito actually brings us tribunal) and you will get punished for leaving because regardless your ruining a game just as much.
You seem to think that Riot would actually consider making a punishment no big deal, something you can just brush off. Just letting you know. That's a stupid little dream...

look tbh.....what i hate is that they make me get leavebuster even though i try my best to get back into a game......my internet connection is working perfectly...and i have the latest laptop....but better yet my ping hits the roof and then i have to try and reconnect countless of times.......after all that...they give me leavebuster still -.-, this is beyond bonkers for me....they should make it that if they afk throughout majority of the game, they get leavebuster. You know there is decent people like myself who try there best to get back in!!

> my internet connection is working perfectly...
>
>but better yet my ping hits the roof and then i have to try and reconnect countless of times...

Well, which is it?
thats what im hoping to find out.
